spells.name: Haste
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit's speed is increased by three hexes per turn
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit's speed is increased by five hexes per turn
spells.expert_level: All friendly units' speed is increased by five hexes per turn

spells.name: Magic Arrow
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 10) + 10) damage
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 10) + 20) damage
spells.expert_level: One enemy target unit receives ((Power x 10) + 30) damage

spells.name: View Air
spells.basic_level: Displays the location of all artifacts on the view world screen
spells.advanced_level: Displays the location of all artifacts and heroes on the view world screen
spells.expert_level: Displays the location of all artifacts, heroes and towns on the view world screen

spells.name: Disguise
spells.basic_level: When the casting hero is right-clicked by opponents, all of the hero's creature troops are displayed as if they were composed of the most powerful creatures in the hero's army. Troop population numbers are represented normally
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect except troop population quantities are represented as '0'
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect except all troops are represented as if populated by the most powerful creature in hero's longest owned town

spells.name: Disrupting Ray
spells.basic_level: Reduces target enemy unit's defense rating by three
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except defense rating is reduced by four
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except defense rating is reduced by five

spells.name: Fortune
spells.basic_level: Increases Luck of target, allied troop by one
spells.advanced_level: Increases Luck of target, allied troop by two
spells.expert_level: Increases Luck of all allied troops by two

spells.name: Remove Obstacle
spells.basic_level: Removes one, non-magic obstacle from the battlefield. Integrated obstacles, such as cliffs are not affected
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except Fire Walls may also be removed
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except all, non-integrated obstacles can be removed

spells.name: Lightning
spells.basic_level: Enemy creature receives ((Power x 25) + 10) damage
spells.advanced_level: Enemy creature receives ((Power x 25) + 20) damage
spells.expert_level: Enemy creature receives ((Power x 25) + 50) damage

spells.name: Precision
spells.basic_level: One friendly troop receives a +3 attack rating bonus for ranged attacks
spells.advanced_level: One friendly troop receives a +6 attack rating bonus for ranged attacks
spells.expert_level: All friendly ranged troops receive a +6 attack rating bonus for ranged attacks

spells.name: Protection From Air
spells.basic_level: Damage from Air Magic spells is reduced by 30% for target, allied troop
spells.advanced_level: Damage from Air Magic spells is reduced by 50% for target, allied troop
spells.expert_level: Damage from Air Magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops

spells.name: Visions
spells.basic_level: Displays number of monsters in a wandering monster troop and whether or not the troop will offer to join the casting hero's army. Range is equal to Power or three, whichever is greater
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except an enemy hero's primary skill stats, and the composition and quantity of the hero’s army can be viewed. Range is (Power x 2) or three, whichever is greater
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced effect, except an enemy town's statistics and garrison composition and quantity may be viewed. Range is (Power x 3) or three, whichever is greater

spells.name: Air Shield
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit takes 25% less damage from ranged attacks
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit takes 50% less damage from ranged attacks
spells.expert_level: All friendly troops take 50% less damage from ranged attacks

spells.name: Destroy Undead
spells.basic_level: All undead creature troops receive ((Power x 10) + 10) damage
spells.advanced_level: All undead creature troops receive ((Power x 10) + 20) damage
spells.expert_level: All undead creature troops receive ((Power x 10) + 50) damage

spells.name: Hypnotize
spells.basic_level: One enemy target unit of less than ((Power x 25) + 10) Health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation
spells.advanced_level: One enemy target unit of less than ((Power x 25) + 20) Health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation
spells.expert_level: One enemy target unit of less than ((Power x 25) + 50) Health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.basic_level: Lightning bolt strikes target troop for ((Power x 40) + 25) damage. Bolt then strikes closest troop for half the damage. Effect continues until 4 troops are hit
spells.advanced_level: Like Basic effect except that initial strike does ((Power x 40) + 50) damage, and bolt strikes five troops
spells.expert_level: Like Advanced effect except that initial strike does ((Power x 40) +100) damage

spells.name: Counterstrike
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit can retaliate against one additional attack per round
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit can retaliate against two additional attacks per round
spells.expert_level: All friendly troops can retaliate against two additional attacks per round

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.basic_level: Teleports hero to target, unoccupied, location that is visible on the Adventure Map with the hero centered. Spell may be cast twice per day and reduces the hero’s movement by three tiles for each casting. If movement is reduced to zero, the spell may not be cast
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic Effect, except the spell may be cast three times in a day
spells.expert_level: Same as Advanced Effect, except the spell may be cast four times in a day, and movement allowance is reduced by two tiles

spells.name: Fly
spells.basic_level: Casting hero can fly over terrain obstacles to an unoccupied map location. Distance traveled may be up to 60% of normal movement
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except the hero may fly up to 80% of normal movement
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except the hero may fly up to 100% of normal movement

spells.name: Magic Mirror
spells.basic_level: One friendly target unit has a 20% chance of redirecting a hostile spell to a random enemy troop
spells.advanced_level: One friendly target unit has a 30% chance of redirecting a hostile spell to a random enemy troop
spells.expert_level: One friendly target unit has a 40% chance of redirecting a hostile spell to a random enemy troop

spells.name: Summon Air Elemental
spells.basic_level: A troop containing (Power x 2) air elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned
spells.advanced_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 3) air elementals are summoned
spells.expert_level: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 4) air elementals are summoned
